description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Mel Tormé, New York, N.Y., between 1946 and 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 4 x 5 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 318 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Tormé, Mel, 1925- Jazz musicians--1940-1950.
